home.description: Self-taught Full-Stack software developer from Venezuela, passionate about solving problems through software, mainly focused on Backend development.

description.p1: Web developer passionate about creating functional, fast, and user-centered digital solutions. I am currently part of the OCAM Group team, where I participate in the development and maintenance of web applications that optimize processes and generate real value for the business.
description.p2: With a background from the University Institute of Industrial Administration Technology, I combine solid technical knowledge with a practical approach to deliver high-quality projects in dynamic environments. I specialize in front-end and back-end development, working with modern technologies to build intuitive interfaces and robust systems.
description.p3: I am motivated by solving real-world problems through code, continuous learning, and collaborating in multidisciplinary teams. I am always looking for opportunities to contribute to innovative projects, whether by improving the user experience, optimizing performance, or implementing new functionalities.
